description:
Update 14 Feb 2016: Highest rated Arabic course on Udemy.

Is this your first time to learn Arabic?

Did you tried before but found it hard to learn and lost interest?

Did you find it hard communicating with other Arab people because of language barrier?

We understand your feelings and we are here to make your life easy!!!

We are providing you this high quality course contains the basics you need to know along with phonetics pronunciation along the way performed by native Arabic speakers.


Course Highlights:

  • High quality course provides all basics to non-Arabic individuals
  • 29 lectures contain HD quality videos total 4+ hours of learning
  • PDF material include Power Point lectures plus additional material
  • End of chapter quizzes contribute to approximately 5+ hours of practice
  • Tutor availability to assist you all the way to complement your learning experience
  • Phonetics guide included in the whole course material


Course Content:

  • Language introduction
  • Arabic alphabets
  • Diacritics
  • Pronouns
  • Interrogative pronouns
  • Verbs
  • Numbers
  • Date and time
  • Emotions and feelings
  • Common phrases


Course Prerequisites:

  • NO previous experience required
  • Willingness to learn a new language

Acquired Benefits:

  • Ability to introduce yourself in Arabic
  • Ability to build basic Arabic questions and sentences
  • Ability to read, write and interact using Arabic language
  • Acquire rich vocabulary as Arabic starter learner beneficial to your needs
title: Arabic For Expats: A Complete Beginners Guide
